meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To rename the Success Dam in Tulare County, California, as the Richard L. Schafer Dam.

main.name: HR2695

content.p: To rename the Success Dam in Tulare County, California, as the Richard L. Schafer Dam.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

subsection.heading: Renaming.—
subsection.content: The Success Dam in Tulare County, California, shall hereafter be known and designated as the “Richard L. Schafer Dam”.

subsection.heading: References.—
subsection.content: Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the dam referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Richard L. Schafer Dam.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
